data.name: DESCRIPTION
data.value:
Software criado, desenvolvido e mantido por Kevin Costa. Programado em C# utilizando .NET Framework 4.8. Sistemas com suporte: Windows 7, 10 e 11.
• Copyright © 2023 Kevin Vinícius Teixeira Costa • Repositório (GitHub): https://github.com/Kevin64/asset-information-and-registration • Repositório das dependências (GitHub): https://github.com/Kevin64/Dependencies • Licença: (MIT) https://github.com/Kevin64/asset-information-and-registration/blob/master/LICENSE
Este software deve ser usado em conjunto com projeto APCS para funcionar corretamente.
► Asset and Personnel Control System - APCS • Copyright © 2023 Kevin Vinícius Teixeira Costa • Repositório (GitHub): https://github.com/Kevin64/asset-and-personnel-control-system • Licença: (MIT) https://github.com/Kevin64/asset-and-personnel-control-system/blob/main/LICENSE
Este software e suas bibliotecas (DLLs) utilizam artes, bibliotecas Open Source e códigos avulsos de terceiros. Todos os créditos vão para os seus respectivos criadores e mantenedores. Estes componentes estão listados abaixo e no README na página do repositório no GitHub.
► Configurable Quality PictureBox (créditos a Jason D) • URL: https://stackoverflow.com/a/1774592/16838132
► Custom Flat ComboBox (créditos a Reza Aghaei) • URL: https://stackoverflow.com/a/65976649/16838132
► CommandLineParser • Copyright © 2005 - 2015 Giacomo Stelluti Scala & Contributors • Repositório (GitHub): https://github.com/commandlineparser/commandline • Licença: (MIT) https://github.com/commandlineparser/commandline/blob/master/License.md
► ini-parser • Copyright © 2008 Ricardo Amores Hernández • Repositório (GitHub): https://github.com/rickyah/ini-parser • Licença: (MIT) https://github.com/rickyah/ini-parser/blob/master/LICENSE
► Microsoft.Web.WebView2 • Copyright © Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved. • URL: https://learn.microsoft.com/pt-br/microsoft-edge/webview2/ • Licença: https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.Web.WebView2/1.0.1722.45/License
► System.Buffers, System.Memory, System.Numerics.Vectors, System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe • Copyright (c) .NET Foundation and Contributors • URL: https://dot.net/ • Licença: (MIT) https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/blob/master/LICENSE.TXT
► WindowsAPICodePack • Copyright © Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved. • Repositório (GitHub): https://github.com/aybe/Windows-API-Code-Pack-1.1 • Licença: https://github.com/aybe/Windows-API-Code-Pack-1.1/blob/master/LICENCE
► PowerShellStandard.Library • Copyright © Microsoft Corporation. • Repositório (GitHub): https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShellStandard • Licença: (MIT) https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/LICENSE.txt
► LoadingCircle (créditos a Martin Gagne) • URL: https://www.codeproject.com/Articles/14841/How-to-write-a-loading-circle-animation-in-NET • Licença: (CPOL) https://www.codeproject.com/info/cpol10.aspx
► Newtonsoft.Json • Copyright © 2007 James Newton-King • Repositório (GitHub): https://github.com/JamesNK/Newtonsoft.Json • Licença: (MIT) https://github.com/JamesNK/Newtonsoft.Json/blob/master/LICENSE.md
► BCrypt.Net-Next • Copyright © 2006 Damien Miller djm@mindrot.org (jBCrypt) • Copyright © 2013 Ryan D. Emerle (.Net port) • Copyright © 2016/2021 Chris McKee (.Net-core port / patches) • Repositório (GitHub): https://github.com/BcryptNet/bcrypt.net • Licença: (MIT) https://github.com/BcryptNet/bcrypt.net/blob/main/licence.txt
► DarkNet (créditos a Ben Hutchison) • Repositório (GitHub): https://github.com/Aldaviva/DarkNet • Licença: (Apache-2.0) https://github.com/Aldaviva/DarkNet/blob/master/License.txt
► fluentui-system-icons • Copyright © 2020 Microsoft Corporation. • Repositório (GitHub): https://github.com/microsoft/fluentui-system-icons • Licença: (MIT) https://github.com/microsoft/fluentui-system-icons/blob/main/LICENSE
► Octokit • Copyright (c) 2017 GitHub, Inc. • Repositório (GitHub): https://github.com/octokit/octokit.net • Licença: (MIT) https://github.com/octokit/octokit.net/blob/main/LICENSE.txt
